answers.answer: Most likely not they told me that with my first and she was a big baby! But its normal they do go by your menstrual cycle so maybe you are a little further along then they thought. What do they plan on doing?

I go for an ultrasound friday to double check the growth. My pregnancy was a picture perfect one til laat week. Now the say I have hig blood pressure and preeclampsia. They are taking my baby boy feb. 27th which is 1week before my due date.
Omg that is crazy!! So those symptoms just came with in the last week? I hope all goes well with everything! Keep me posted....good luck with the ultrasound to!
Yes they came out of no where. I will keep you posted as i know what is going on.

That's the same thing that happened to me today! I'm 30 weeks, but he's measuring 34 weeks. I'm going for a growth ultrasound in 2 weeks. He measured 5 days ahead @ the 9 week ultrasound, then 10 days ahead @ the 20 week ultrasound. I'm glad you asked this question, because they can't give me any specifics. Yes, please keep us updated!
Plus, I'm really sure about my due date, because I was tracking all if my info, like ovulation, missed period, etc. I guess he will just be a big boy!
Yea that is crazy to find all that out at the end of your pregnancy!! Im praying for both of you ladies good luck
I know how you ladies feel when I did my ultrasound at 28 weeks thy told me that my baby girl was measuring 30 weeks. I'm scared that I'm going to have a big baby and will end up having a c section!?

They said the same to me every time I went. I told them I was 100% of our 'oopsie' date so there was no way I was further along. So they did another scan and saw that he was perfect. He is a little bigger than what he is supposed to be but they said it just means he will be about 7-8 lb baby.  Otherwise very healthy! ;)

question: So i am at my doc appt right now and they said baby boy is measuring 37 weeks but i am only 33+5 weeks.. i think i am going to have a big baby boy! Any chance they are wrong on measurements?
title: OMG!!!
